Description.Text: Welcome to Fuerteventura - welcome to "Las Marismas", our new apartment complex in Corralejo. Here, in the northern part of the island and only 35 kilometres from the airport, a holiday of sea, sand and sun awaits you. The warm climate of our canarien island, the stylish comfort of our complex, the long beaches of the sand dunes and the many sports possibilities will make your stay a relaxed nature experience. We are happy to welcome you as our guests. The Las Marismas - opened in 2003 - welcome you as a complete architectural composition amazed by the bright apartments with big spacious terraces, a wide range of canarien and international food from our restaurants, the big pool landscape and the magic of our gardens. The great pool landscape blends magically into the Las Marismas complex. Dive into our salt water pool or enjoy the heated fresh water lagoon with this beautiful waterfall. With a depths of 1,40 metre you can let the children play without worry and you can lean back and enjoy your holiday. Find your favourite spot under the sunny Fuerteventura sky or under the big umbrellas. You can relax on one of the many sunbeds made from comfortable teak wood including mattress and big pool towel. For smaller children there is an extra shallow heated kiddy-pool with a fountain close to the children's play area. Walk trough the great architectually flattering garden facilities. Here you will find all the elements of the suspenseful landscape of Fuerteventura. On sunny and shady paths you will discover small grottos, olive trees, palm trees, cactus gardens and the typical volcano/ravine landscape "malpais" of our island. Let yourself be surprised and inspired by this garden.

The Las Marismas De Corralejo Apartments are across the road from the island`s aquapark, 400 metres from the centre of the resort and 700 metres from the sandy beach. Corralejo is a lively resort with a relaxed atmosphere and from the north, with the small island of Lobos, to the peninsula of Jandia in the south, Fuerteventura has one great beach after another.

Variety plays a big role in our gastronomic offers: In our "Restaurant Buffet", we will serve you the breakfast and dinner in a friendly atmosphere or on the terrace right outside of the restaurant. In the shade of the big veranda you can enjoy the "Restaurant Pool Bar", directrly by the pool area for lunch with delicacies of the Canaries, Mediterranean and international kitchen. As well during the day, you can find refreshing drinks and a big range of ice cream at the "Pool Bar". The perfect meeting point for an appetizer or for a lovely drink after dinner is our "Bar Las Marismas" with a big variety of international cocktails and long drinks. For a great evening experience, you are invited to the "Bar Salon " with amazing shows and live music and it is also the meeting point for the children's mini disco.
